metadata.title: The Haunting of Ypsilon-14
metadata.author: @redhg, @tom
metadata.comment: Phosphor content file for the 'Haunting of Ypsilon-14' module for the Mothership tabletop roleplaying game. Visit https://redhg.com/ypsilon14/ to see the compiled application.

config.name: YPSILON-14

NOTES:          Experienced in station logistics and personnel management.
Known to be strict but fair.
2366-06-10: REPORT #4572 :: Crew member Mikhail Radimir reported a malfunctioning airlock in the hydroponics lab. Maintenance scheduled.
2366-05-22: REPORT #4531 :: Unauthorized access attempt detected in docking bay 2. Security footage reviewed; no further action required.
2366-05-15: REPORT #4510 :: Minor fire in crew quarters kitchen extinguished. No injuries reported. Fire safety protocols reviewed with staff.
2366-04-30: REPORT #4487 :: Supply shipment delayed due to meteor shower. Estimated arrival time updated.
Please describe the incident you wish to report below.
Any unauthorised access will be logged and reported.
Enter username below, or BACK to return.
Enter password below, or BACK to return.

FOR SECURITY REASONS, A PASSPHRASE HAS BEEN GENERATED. PLEASE ENTER THE FOLLOWING PASSPHRASE TO CONTINUE.

content: {alert:EMPLOYEES ARE REMINDED THAT INCIDENT REPORTING IS MANDATORY.}
News has reached the company that there is a potential union organiser on Ypsilon-14. Obviously, this is a completely unacceptable situation which should be rectified at the soonest opportunity.
The company is aware of your upcoming mission to Ypsilon-14. If you are able to provide us with intelligence on the identity of this organiser, I am authorised to give you a credit bonus of 10kcr.

Further to this, if you are able to deal with the organiser and neutralise the unionisation threat, that bonus will be increased to 50kcr. We have no preference on your methods of neutralisation and leave it up to your professional discretion.
We trust you will be discreet with this matter. I need not remind you of the consequences of a breach of confidentiality.
FORCED MISSION UPDATE: AUTHORISATION CODE GAMMA 2 ALPHA
â–ª MAINTAIN ORIGINAL OBJECTIVES ABOARD `IMV ENTER NAME`
â–ª IT IS IMPERATIVE THAT THE BREACH DOES NOT SPREAD
â–ª SECRECY PREFERRED, BUT NOT ESSENTIAL
â–ª COMPENSATION OF 35KCR UPON SUCCESSFUL COMPLETION
Cannot unlock remotely. Manual intervention required.
A copy of the station map is available via the data tablet.
Incident reporting in progress. Please wait 2-4 standard hours for transmission and processing.
Incident reporting unavailable, subspace relays occupied, incident transmission in progress.
